Method Detail

buildSnapshot

private void buildSnapshot()
Build the snapshot ; called by the constructor (and should never be called directly). This method build the realm snapshot, saving buildings and goods in the database.

countBoostedBuildings

public int countBoostedBuildings()
Count boosted buildings in this snapshot.

Returns:
Integer number of boosted buildings in the realm.

Count stopped/disabled buildings in this snapshot.

Returns:
Integer number of stopped buildings in the realm.
